mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p WHERE exists( select a.sys_role_permission_id from sys_role_permission a join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.sys_role_id join sys_user_role c on c.role_id = b.sys_role_id join sys_user d on d.sys_user_id = c.user_id where p.sys_permission_id = a.permission_id AND d.login_name = #{loginName} AND b.del_flag = 0 ) and p.del_flag = 0 order by p.sort ASC

select a.sys_permission_id, a.name, a.is_leaf top_leaf, b.name as second_name,b.sys_permission_id as second_id, b.is_leaf second_leaf, c.name as last_name,c.sys_permission_id as last_id, c.is_leaf last_leaf from sys_permission a left join sys_permission b on a.sys_permission_id = b.parent_id AND b.menu_type = 1 and b.del_flag = 0 left join sys_permission c on b.sys_permission_id = c.parent_id AND c.menu_type = 2 and c.del_flag = 0 where a.menu_type = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY a.sort,b.sort,c.sort
